Title: Friday 13
Original title: Friday the 13th
Country: USA
USA release: 09/05/1980
Premiere in Spain
Special Edition: 22/09/2009
Blu-ray release: 22/09/2009
Studio: Paramount Pictures
Director: Sean S. Cunningham
Writer: Victor Miller
Starring: Kevin Bacon, Betsy Palmer, Adrienne King, Harry Crosby


Synopsis:
Camp Crystal Lake, closed for twenty years due to a series of terrible crimes that were never resolved, has reopened its doors. Several young people are eager to start the fun at summer camp, but when night falls bringing a violent storm, someone wants to play the murderer. "Friday 13" has 9 terrifying consequences that prove its success. The sinister murderer in search of blood is Jason and young people destined to be killed with bloody and methodical precision (including Kevin Bacon) is about to find out that Friday 13 is the fateful day and pray that it is only a nightmare.
